mapper.sql: select b.id,b.userid,username,honor,sex,headurl,threadid,parentid,content,b.time,count(c.commitid) zannumber,count(d.commitid) isliked from commit b INNER JOIN user a ON b.userid=a.userid left OUTER JOIN commitzan c ON c.commitid=b.id
mapper.select: select honor,username,sex,phone,headurl,b.* from user a,commit b,thread c where a.userid=b.userid and c.id=b.threadid order by threadid
select a.*,count(b.userid) zannumber from user a,commit b WHERE b.time>DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK) and a.userid=b.userid GROUP BY b.userid ORDER BY zannumber desc
select honor,username,sex,phone,headurl,b.* from user a,commit b where a.userid=b.userid and b.userid=#{userId}
